meta.description: Luna Launcher: A lightweight, clean, and customizable Minecraft launcher focused on freedom and organization.

hero.title: Lightweight, Clean, and Customizable Minecraft Launcher
hero.description: Focused on instance isolation and making it easier to use: manage modpacks, update resources, and keep each world and configuration separate.
hero.notice: Early version: You may need to build it yourself or contact the developer for a test version.

features.title: Features
features.lead: Building on the Prism Launcher experience, making common tasks like installation, maintenance, and version switching easier.
features.modpack_desc: Easily install and launch modpacks while keeping your instance directory clean. Reduce repetitive manual installation, update, and troubleshooting work.
features.download_desc: Supports community mirror APIs (like BMCLAPI) for smoother downloads in China's network environment. BMCLAPI support is still being refined and may not be available in all scenarios.
features.instance_desc: Each instance has independent mods, resource packs, and settings. Prevents old versions from resetting settings or accidentally corrupting worlds.

get.title: Get Started
get.lead: Currently in early development: stable installation packages may not be available yet. Targeted at developers and early testers.
get.panel_build: Recommended: Build and run it yourself following the build guide. You can also check Releases for preview builds.
get.panel_contact: If you need a test version or encounter issues, feel free to contact the developer through Issues.
get.notice: Note: Mirror API support (including BMCLAPI) is still being improved. If you encounter download issues, please provide feedback so we can improve.

community.title: Community
community.lead: We carefully read every piece of feedback and welcome contributions to development.
community.feedback_desc: Submit issues, feature requests, or UI suggestions to GitHub Issues, and include logs and reproduction steps when possible.
community.contribute_desc: Whether it's fixing a small bug or providing new icons and UI designs, all contributions are valuable.

footer.disclaimer: Luna Launcher is an independent fork of Prism Launcher and is not affiliated with or endorsed by the Prism Launcher project.
